description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>This year, more than 100,000 nonprofits around the world connected with their communities and spread awareness about their causes using Google products. As 2018 comes to an end, we’re taking a look back at the many ways these organizations used technology to make a difference.</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="donorschoose" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Screenshot_2018-12-19_at_1.41.58_PM.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>DonorsChoose.org allows teachers to create projects that fulfill resources their students need.</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><h3>DonorsChoose.org drives donations with Google Ad Grants</h3><p>As the leading platform for giving to public schools, <a href="https://www.google.com/grants/success-stories/donors-choose.html">DonorsChoose.org</a> allows teachers across America to bring their classroom dreams to life by requesting much-needed materials and experiences for their students. Google Ads’ ad performance data provides the organization a clear picture of teachers’ classroom needs and donor interest. And conversion tracking data allows DonorsChoose.org to make sure they’re using their Ad Grants account to the fullest. Through Ad Grants ads, the organization drove 7,000 teacher registrations and raised an additional $497,000 from about 5,000 donations in a year.<br/></p><h3>Raising money for Hope for Paws with YouTube Giving</h3><p>Hope for Paws, a nonprofit animal rescue group, used <a href="https://youtube-creators.googleblog.com/2018/08/introducing-youtube-giving-new-tools.html">YouTube Giving</a> Fundraisers (beta) so that anyone could support them by clicking the “Donate” button on their videos. Through this feature, Hope for Paws was able to raise over $260,000 in September and tell their story to a global audience.<br/></p><h3>Using mapping tools at the Geo for Good summit</h3><p>In October, the Google Earth Outreach team hosted the <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RP_be5j8hhc&amp;feature=youtu.be">Geo for Good Summit</a>. At the summit, Googlers and nonprofit partners demonstrated how Google mapping tools—like <a href="http://earth.google.com">Google Earth</a>, <a href="http://earthengine.google.com">Earth Engine</a>, <a href="https://cloud.google.com/maps-platform/maps/?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=cpc&amp;utm_campaign=FY18-Q2-global-demandgen-paidsearchonnetworkhouseads-cs-maps_contactsal_saf&amp;utm_content=text-ad-none-none-DEV_c-CRE_277743457166-ADGP_Hybrid+%7C+AW+SEM+%7C+SKWS+~+Mapping+Platform-KWID_43700034404000334-kwd-365155410602-userloc_9031923&amp;utm_term=KW_%2Bmapping%20%2Bplatform-ST_%2Bmapping+%2Bplatform&amp;gclid=CNmku4DOh98CFQCJxQIdrLABCA">Google Maps Platform</a> and <a href="https://www.google.com/streetview/publish/">360 Street View Imagery</a>—can help organizations raise awareness, whether it’s through <a href="https://www.google.com/earth/outreach/success-stories/neighbors-against-irresponsible-logging-nail/">mapping and monitoring threats to the planet</a> or <a href="https://www.google.com/earth/outreach/success-stories/chief-almir-and-the-surui-tribe-of-the-amazon/">mapping indigenous culture</a>.<br/></p><h3>Expanding reach with Google Maps Platform credits</h3><p>Organizations like <a href="http://inaturalist.org">iNaturalist</a>, <a href="http://code.org/">Code.org</a> and c<a href="https://www.charitywater.org/">harity:water</a> use the Google Maps Platform to help them reach their goals—from using Maps as a new way for donors to view exactly where their dollars go, to helping people discover plant and animal life from around the world. In 2018, we expanded access for nonprofits to use these products in over <a href="https://support.google.com/nonprofits/answer/1614602">50 countries</a>.<br/></p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="sciences" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/image2_sFdXJ3H.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>The Philippine Coral Reef at the California Academy of Sciences.</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><h3>Collaborating with G Suite: Samasource and the California Academy of Sciences</h3><p></p><p>This year, Samasource and the California Academy of Sciences presented at <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=syKGZeEL1kQ">Cloud Next ’18</a> about how they used G Suite to make a difference. Samasource, a nonprofit organization that aims to reduce global poverty by connecting unemployed people in impoverished countries to digital work, connected its teams through G Suite for Nonprofits. By streamlining workflows across multiple locations, the Samasource team was able to focus on their goal of helping over 45,000 people out of poverty.</p><p>The California Academy of Sciences highlights biodiversity research and exploration, environmental education and sustainability across the globe. At no cost, G Suite for Nonprofits helped the Academy improve accessibility and collaboration across their team. Now, 650 staff members at the Academy can store, search and access shared content from anywhere.</p><h3>Looking ahead to 2019</h3><p>Let us know how Google for Nonprofits has made a difference for your nonprofit. In 2019, we’ll be traveling around the world to film a video with five different nonprofits. If your organization has benefited from using Google products, share your story <a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeXjoNJpvh1Mdo9cuApA71LXVbmBPdN3pu5ZGj4PrnCsbYPcA/viewform">here</a> and you could be one of them.<br/></p><p></p></div></div></body></html>
title: Google for Nonprofits: 2018 in Review

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Ahh, the holidays. It's the time of year where you might want to sink into your couch for a movie marathon, but you also have to chase a few toddlers around and get ready to host your entire family for dinner. This season, we’re here to help with a few ways you can take the hassle out of the holidays with Google Home Hub.</p><br/><h3>Get festive</h3><p>Quit digging under the Christmas tree to turn on the lights—ask Google Home Hub to do it for you by plugging your lights into a compatible smart plug. Then say, “Hey Google, turn on the Christmas tree,” to watch it light up. While you’re decking the halls, your favorite holiday tunes are only a few words away as well. Just say, “Hey Google, play Christmas hits” to get those sleigh bells ringing (you may need a subscription).</p><br/><h3>Get the family together</h3><p>As you’re snapping selfies with the fam, our live albums feature with Google Photos will let you see your best and latest shots on Hub automatically. And while everyone is gathered around, you can relive memories of holidays past. Just say, “Hey Google, show my photos from last December.” Or, you can all curl up on the couch and have Hub <a href="https://assistant.google.com/services/a/uid/0000005e3cde0cc0?e=-WebDirectoryEmbeddedWebviewExperiment&amp;jsmode=o">tell you a holiday story</a>.</p><br/><h3>Get ready for Santa</h3><p>If you’re a parent like me, getting your kids excited about the arrival of Santa is so much fun. If they’re wondering when the presents will start showing up, Google Home Hub can help you track Santa’s arrival starting December 23. Just say, “Hey Google, where’s Santa?” If Christmas Eve is too far away, “Hey Google, call Santa” will connect you to the North Pole, so you can help Santa rehearse for his musical concert.</p><br/><h3>Get help in the kitchen</h3><p>Whether you’re crafting a gingerbread house, mixing your favorite holiday cocktail or just trying not to ruin the turducken, use your voice to browse millions of recipes, get step-by-step cooking instructions, set cooking timers and more. With “My Cookbook” you can even save your favorite recipes on Hub for your next holiday party.  </p><br/><h3>Get things done</h3><p>The holidays are hectic, so let Google Home Hub be your personal taskmaster. You can set reminders to make sure that you hide the package deliveries and Hub can even remember where you hid your gifts after you wrapped them. If you’re traveling this holiday season, get quick and easy driving and flight info on Hub, with directions sent right to your phone. And, if you’re panicking because one of your present deliveries is delayed, don’t worry—just say “Hey Google, where is the closest toy store?” (insert “jewelry store” as needed).  </p><br/><h3>Get ready to be the life of the party</h3><p>My wife tells me that New Year’s Eve is the best time to try a new makeup technique. With Google Home Hub, you can ace any look, hands-free, with help from Sephora. Just say, “Hey Google, show me holiday party looks videos by Sephora.” You can also brush up on the latest dance moves before your New Year’s Eve party with Hub. Try: “Hey Google, show me how to do the floss” and you’ll be grooving in no time. And if you’re the one hosting the party this year, the Nest Hello video doorbell works with Google Home Hub to show you who’s at the front door automatically. Use the new two-way talk back feature to greet your guests to let them know the door is open and the champagne is flowing.</p><br/><p>Now that you've gotten everything taken care of with Google Home Hub, get back to the couch and press play on more holiday movies.</p><p><br/></p></div></div></body></html>
title: Deck the halls with help from Google Home Hub

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Getting out of bed on most days in the winter can be tough. But the winter solstice on December 21 makes it even harder, since the Northern Hemisphere is in the dark longer than any other day of the year. To help get you out of bed in the dark mornings of winter with a little spring in your step (pun very much intended), if you have a Pixel 3 and Pixel Stand, you can turn on Sunrise Alarm to get a more natural, brighter wake-up.</p><p></p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--small h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--2 h-c-grid__col--offset-5 "><img alt="Sunrise Alarm GIF" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/original_images/Sunrise_Alarm.gif"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Scientists have proven that waking up to soft light helps ease you out of your sleep rhythm for  a less jarring wake-up, which in turn sets you out on the right path for your day. In places like the Nordics, where it stays darker longer during the winter, wake-up lights have been popular for years. Engineers on #teampixel were inspired by these lamps and sought a way to create the same effects of an “artificial dawn” to help Pixel users get out of bed each morning. Once you turn on Sunrise Alarm, Pixel 3’s screen will slowly brighten in the 15 minutes leading up to the alarm going off, changing from a deep red to orange, then finally, to soft yellow—recreating the beauty of a real dawn to ease you into a better wake-up.</p><br/><p>When docked on Pixel Stand, you can use Pixel 3 to customize your settings to help disconnect from technology gradually before bed. Try out features like Wind Down, automatic Do Not Disturb and more of the Digital Wellbeing suite available on Pixel.</p><br/><p>Now, #teampixel can get their day started on the right foot—even if it’s in the dark—with Sunrise Alarm.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: On the year's darkest day, wake up gradually with Pixel 3 and Pixel Stand

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><br/><p>With the launch of new solutions and new resources, 2018 has been a busy—and exciting—year. As the calendar turns to 2019, now is a good time to reflect on a few noteworthy moments from 2018.</p></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="1" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-01_DLqdV1X.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>A new brand for ads and analytics</h3>We <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/marketingplatform/360/introducing-google-marketing-platform/">announced Google Marketing Platform</a>, which brought together DoubleClick Digital Marketing and the Google Analytics 360 Suite, to help you plan, buy, measure and optimize digital media and customer experiences in one place. Google Marketing Platform allows you deliver more relevant and effective marketing, while ensuring that you respect your customers’ privacy and give them control over their data.</div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="2" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-02_oN49DjD.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>Stronger collaboration with Display &amp; Video 360</h3>As part of the rebrand of our ads and analytics products, we also introduced <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/marketingplatform/360/display-and-video-360-stronger-collaboration/?linkId=54092417">Display &amp; Video 360</a>, a single, integrated product that helps creative, data and media teams work together to execute end-to-end ad campaigns. This <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/marketingplatform/360/bring-your-marketing-teams-closer-together-display-video-360/">blog series</a> shows how leading brands are using Display &amp; Video 360 to better collaborate during the campaign creation process and get better business outcomes as a result.</div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="3" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-03_gPFfSFb.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>Deeper analysis in Analytics 360</h3><p>We introduced three new powerful techniques that help you better understand how customers interact with your website via Advanced Analytics in Analytics 360. Using Exploration, Funnel Analysis, and Segment Overlap, you can dive deeper and surface hard-to-find insights that you can then easily put into action. Our <a href="https://marketingplatform.google.com/about/resources/analytics-360-advanced-analysis-feature-brief/">feature brief</a> takes a closer look at the ways Advanced Analysis helps you use data to get the answers you need to make critical business decisions—keeping your customers satisfied and your business thriving.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="4" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-04_0UuHO6o.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>Cross Device capabilities in Google Analytics</h3><p>We help you see when users visit your website from two different devices, instead of seeing metrics that show two separate sessions, with the launch of new <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/marketingplatform/360/cross-device-capabilities/">Cross Device</a> capabilities in Google Analytics. These features offer a more complete view of your marketing impact so you can run smarter campaigns that deliver more tailored experiences to your customers.</p><p><br/></p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="5" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-05_gWPS8Im.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>Data Studio for everyone</h3>Data Studio moved out of beta and is now <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/marketingplatform/analytics/data-studio-now-generally-available/">generally available</a>. This launch showed our continued commitment to helping teams identify and share insights from their data, so they can take steps to improve business outcomes.</div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="6" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-06_1RNaB0A.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>New Media Rating Council accreditations</h3>To ensure the metrics our advertising solutions provide continue to be trusted and aligned with industry standards, we announced <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/ads/transparency-choice-ads-measurement/">new Media Rating Council (MRC) accreditations</a> in September. YouTube video ad impressions and viewability metrics for desktop, mobile web, and mobile in-app are now fully MRC accredited in Google Ads, Display &amp; Video 360, and Campaign Manager.</div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>We hope 2018 was a great year for you and your business and we thank you for your partnership. Stay tuned for what’s to come in 2019!</p></div></div></body></html>
title: A Look Back at 2018 with Google Marketing Platform

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Wherever we live, whatever our background, we’ve all seen the pain caused by senseless acts of terrorism. Just last week, the tragic murder of Christmas shoppers in Strasbourg was a sobering reminder that terrorist attacks can happen at any time.</p><br/><p>What is clear from such attacks is that we all—government, industry, and civil society—have to remain vigilant and work together to address this continuing threat. While governments and civil society groups face a complex challenge in deterring terrorist violence, collaboration across the industry to responsibly address terrorist content online is delivering progress. And more tech companies must join the fight against terrorist content online.</p><br/><p>In June 2017 senior representatives from Facebook, Microsoft, Twitter and YouTube came together to form the Global Internet Forum to Counter Terrorism (GIFCT), a coalition to share information on how to best curb the spread of terrorism online. I’ve had the responsibility of chairing this Forum for its initial a year and a half, and I’m pleased to report that the Forum has helped to deliver significant results across a number of areas.</p><br/><p>In September 2017 at the United Nations General Assembly, I joined the leaders of the United Kingdom, France, and Italy to discuss what more the tech industry could do to combat terrorist content. I was there on behalf of the GIFCT member companies to present our commitments to tackle terrorism online: We collectively pledged to develop and share technology to responsibly address terrorist content across the industry; to fund research and share good practices that help all companies stay abreast of the latest trends; and to elevate positive counter messages.  </p><br/><p>We understand that we must responsibly lead the way in developing new technologies and standards for identifying and removing harmful terrorist content. As EU Commissioner Avromopolis said: “The tools you are developing yourselves on your platforms are the most effective counter-measures we all have. That is why I am a strong supporter of your efforts under the Global Internet Forum to Counter Terrorism.” A key pillar of GIFCT’s work to drive progress is maintaining a shared database of digital fingerprints (hashes) of known terrorist content that lets any member of the coalition automatically find and remove identical terrorist content on their platforms. In 2018, we set—and achieved—an ambitious goal of depositing 100k new hashes in the database.</p><br/><p>Over the past year and a half, we’ve also engaged smaller businesses around the world to discuss their unique needs and to share ways to responsibly address terrorist content online. With the UN’s counterterrorism directorate and the UN-initiated TechAgainstTerrorism program, we’ve worked with more than 100 tech companies on four continents. We also convened forums in Europe, the Asia Pacific region, and Silicon Valley for companies, civil society groups, and governments to share experiences and get suggestions for further efforts.</p><br/><p>To enhance our understanding of the latest trends in online terrorist propaganda, GIFCT has been working with a research network led by the Royal United Services Institute. We are speaking with its network of eight think tanks around the world about how terrorist networks operate online, the ethics of content moderation, and the interplay between online content and offline actions. That network will publish ten academic papers over the next six months to benefit everyone working on the problem of terrorist content online.</p><br/><p>We’ve also successfully worked alongside governments and Internet Referral Units, like Europol to get terrorist content down even more quickly. With civil society organizations, we’ve developed a tool that will help them mount counter extremism campaigns across many online platforms at once. And together with Google.org, we launched a $5 million innovation fund to counter hate and extremism. The fund gives grants to nonprofits that are countering hate, both online and off. Our £1M pilot program in the UK received over 230 applications, and we awarded grants to 22 initiatives.</p><br/><p>These are significant developments for the industry, but we know we have much more to do. The Forum will continue to expand our membership, vastly increase the size of our database of hashes, and do even more to help small companies and academic websites responsibly address terrorist content.</p><br/><p>We can never be complacent against the continuing threat of terrorism. The work being done today by our coalition members has helped limit the use of our platforms by terrorist organizations, and we have extended an open invitation to others in the industry to join with us in this effort. Working together, we will continue to develop and implement solutions across the industry to protect our users, our societies, and a free and open internet.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: To stop terror content online, tech companies need to work together

description: <p>编者按：本文作者&nbsp;Suneera Tandon，原文标题&nbsp;<a href="https://qz.com/india/1496996/miniso-is-obsessing-over-indias-thrifty-shoppers/" target="_blank">Miniso is obsessing over India’s thrifty shoppers</a>。</p><p>名创优品为印度市场规划了宏伟的蓝图。</p><p>进入印度仅一年，这家“中日混血”公司已在该国建立起稳定的客户群。其提供的文具、水壶等各类商品受到了对价格敏感的印度消费者的欢迎。目前，名创优品已经在印度开了近70家店，第一年的营业额为<a href="https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/services/retail/miniso-completes-1-year-in-india-achieves-rs-700-crore-revenue/articleshow/65499792.cms">70亿卢比</a>（9800万美元）。</p><p>这使得印度成为名创优品增长最快的三大市场之一。</p><p>印度名创优品首席业务发展官刘阳在采访中向 Quartz 透露，受到市场反响的鼓舞，公司已经制定到2020年开800家店的计划。公司接下来将瞄准印度三四线城市，甚至会考虑招募加盟商和其它合作形式，以助其扩张。</p><p>名创优品最为人所知的商品是文具、收纳用品、化妆品和时尚装饰，公司最近刚获得<a href="https://www.insideretail.com.au/news/world/wechat-owner-invests-miniso-chain-201810">腾讯</a>和高瓴资本的投资。刘阳称，这将有助于公司提升国际影响力。名创优品已进入79个国家和地区，包括加拿大、美国、俄罗斯、阿联酋、朝-鲜、香港、巴基斯坦、印尼和新加坡。</p><p><strong>以下为刘阳采访节选：</strong></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">你们最初在印度开店的计划是什么？</h3><p>两年前，我们的计划是开尽可能多的直营店，进入印度所有主要城市。但由于我们才刚成立五年，还不是一个十分成熟的品牌。我们刚开始和购物中心开发商谈判时，发现他们完全不了解我们的模式，没听说过名创优品这个牌子，也不想我们入驻。除了极个别的，大部分商场都并不积极。但我们后来在德里 Vasant Kunj 区的 Ambience Mall 开了一家店，顾客的反响很不错。</p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">一年前，印度没人听过名创优品这个品牌，名创优品做了什么来改变这一局面？</h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">我认为我们的路走对了。我们对利润率没有太高的要求，为了拿到最优惠的价格，我们一直在和生产厂家合作，还特意为印度市场修改了我们的定价策略，与巴西和美国市场相比，印度市场的价格更有竞争力。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">你们最初在印度面临的挑战是什么？</h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从商业角度而言，让我们头痛的是印度没有更多高品质的购物中心。如果有更好的购物中心，我们就能开更多店。孟买多雨，德里夏季温度又很高，这种时候人们很少会去露天街道购物。而在购物中心，你什么都能买到。对我们而言，把店开在购物中心肯定是更好的选择，客单价也更高。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">你们计划在印度开多少家店？</h3><p>截止目前，我们已经在印度开了67家店（包括加盟店和直营店）。到2020年，我们希望开到800家店。</p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">既然高品质的购物中心在印度本来就不多，800家店你们打算怎么开？</h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">目前我们只在印度大城市的主要购物中心开了店。以我们的价格和商品品质，我认为我们在二三四线城市不会遇到太多的挑战（在需求方面）。但我们可能会调整商业模式。起初我们开的都是直营店，但很显然，哪家公司也没有那么多资金去开那么多家店。这也是我们在印度开放加盟的原因。明年我们可能又会有新的模式，这个我们内部还在讨论。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">你们在小城市的扩张目前进行得如何？</h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">印度小城市的运费和物流费用更高，扩张并不容易。仓储是我们需要解决的一大问题。目前我们有4000个 SKU，在印度有三个仓库（位于古尔冈和孟买）。以我们的标准，三个都是高投资的大型仓库。把商品运到阿萨姆或米佐拉姆等相对偏远的市场成本很高。因此，鉴于我们的库存量很大，尽管顾客反响非常好，我认为我们还是需要重新评估一下运输成本和SKU结构。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">你们的电商计划呢？</h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">电商这块我们正在筹备中。但作为一家快时尚公司，我们需要从线下零售做起。因此，在印度，线上会是我们线下业务的一个补充，但不会是我们关注的重点。在布局线上之前，我们要确保线下商店已经得到了尽可能多的资源。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">和其它国家相比，你怎么看印度市场的增速？你们销量最高的商品是什么？</h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">印度是我们增长最快的三大市场之一，另外两个是印尼和墨西哥。水壶和香水在印度卖得很好。我们之后也会在印度推出大量新品，包括电子甚至美容产品。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">你们的商店盈利了吗？</h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">单就商店而言，我们的直营店是盈利的。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">名创优品的商品大部分是在中国生产的，你们会考虑在当地生产和供货吗？</h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">有的。我们总公司有人在专门负责当地供货这一块。他们也在考虑和印度本地的生产厂商合作，这个很快就会有结果。大家很快就能在店里发现（印度产的）商品。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"><br/></span></p><p>---------------------</p><p>Hi 我是36氪出海的赵小纯，关注出海。目前36氪出海正在筹备出海社群，欢迎出海圈人士加微信 Shanchuanhuhaiz 交流。麻烦备注姓名+公司+职位，感谢！</p><p><strong>36氪国际站&nbsp;</strong><a href="https://kr-asia.com/"><strong>KrASIA</strong></a><strong>&nbsp;出品</strong></p><h3>别错过</h3><p>1.“36氪出海”微信公众号现已问世！扫描下方二维码，或者微信搜索“36氪出海”（ID: wow36krchuhai），关注起来吧！将为大家集中地提供出海的好内容。多谢关注，请多多推荐！</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201809/03103246/wjwyztqx9a8kh1lw.jpeg!1200" data-img-size-val="334,193" width="334"/></p><p>2.“出海频道”也在36氪app上开出来了！这里有数百篇出海主题的好文章，有一大批是在微信上没有的喔！来，跟着小动画，三步置顶出海频道，一键直达关键动态。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201809/27141226/z4aq3gzcta61c7kx.gif!1200" data-img-size-val="262,466" width="262"/></p><p>&nbsp;<br/></p><p><br/></p>
title: 名创优品的印度增长故事：开放加盟，已有近70家店

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>For the first time in 22 years, Alice Johnson will be home for the holidays. Now a great-grandmother, Johnson was sentenced to life in prison without parole for a first-time, non-violent drug felony in 1997. She had spent over two decades behind bars when her story gained national attention—prompting President Trump to officially reduce Johnson’s sentence and send her home free earlier this year. Johnson’s case set off a long-overdue debate around the country about harsh sentencing laws and the need to reform our criminal justice system.</p><p>We’ve long supported efforts to end mass incarceration and help individuals like Johnson get a second chance. In 2017, we collaborated on a YouTube video in which Johnson urged the public from her prison cell to advocate for the release of those serving life sentences for nonviolent offenses. We later partnered with Mic.com to produce a <a href="https://mic.com/articles/185472/this-grandmother-is-serving-a-life-sentence-for-a-nonviolent-offense#.83X9HB3Rn">digital op-ed</a>, which caught the attention of Kim Kardashian West and inspired her to take up Johnson’s cause.</p><p>America’s thirty-year experiment with mandatory minimum sentences and sweeping criminalization has too often imposed unfair and disproportionate penalties on people across the country. As a former prosecutor, I have witnessed many individuals and families bear the consequences of these policies—policies that haven’t made us any safer, but have cost millions in taxpayer dollars and cast a pall over many lives.</p><p>This week, Congress—in a rare show of bipartisan consensus—passed the First Step Act, changing these policies and reforming our criminal justice system. The legislation lowers mandatory minimum sentences for drug felonies, reduces the disparity in sentencing guidelines between crack and powder cocaine offenses, and gives judges the discretion to shorten mandatory minimum sentences for low-level crimes. President Trump has already expressed support for the bill, and we look forward to him quickly signing it into law.</p><p>The Act marks an important step forward in restoring equal justice and due process, and promoting consistency and fairness in sentencing. Moreover, the Act includes measures that will bolster rehabilitation programs in prisons across the country to help incarcerated women and men successfully re-enter society, reduce recidivism rates, and make our communities safer.</p><p>Google.org has long backed these kinds of efforts to improve our criminal justice system. We’ve <a href="https://www.google.org/our-work/inclusion/center-policing-equity/">supported</a> work by non-profits <a href="https://blog.google/outreach-initiatives/google-org/doing-more-racial-justice/">promoting reform</a> and by police departments working to improve interactions with their communities. We have promoted <a href="https://www.google.org/our-work/inclusion/vera-institute-of-justice/">the use of data</a> to increase the <a href="https://www.blog.google/outreach-initiatives/google-org/two-years-supporting-racial-justice/">transparency</a> of our criminal justice system. And we have launched programs like our digital <a href="https://www.blog.google/outreach-initiatives/public-policy/love-letters-children-of-incarcerated/">LoveLetters</a> initiative, which supports children with imprisoned parents.  </p><p>While we’re encouraged by the passage of the First Step Act, there is still more work to be done at the federal, state, and local level to improve our criminal justice system. And we all have a part to play. As an example, our company policies seek to promote fair hiring by “banning the box” (requiring job applicants to disclose criminal history only once they get a chance to interview) and encouraging our suppliers to do the same. And we don’t accept ads for bail bonds, an industry with an unfortunate history of predatory practices.</p><p>We look forward to continuing to work with people from many backgrounds and across a spectrum of views, united in our belief that America’s legal and criminal justice systems can and should be an example to the world.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: A "First Step" towards criminal justice reform

description: <h3 label="二级标题">大公司</h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150151" target="_blank" style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">王兴质押全部摩拜股权，距工商变更完成仅20天</a><br/></p><p>据搜狐财经，全国企业信用信息公示系统显示，美团创始人、CEO王兴于12月18日将其持有的北京摩拜科技有限公司出资额全数质押，同一时间，美团点评联合创始人穆荣均也将其持有的摩拜出资额全数质押。今年11月27日，摩拜刚刚完成美团收购后的股权变更登记显示，王兴、穆荣均取代摩拜创始团队，成为两大持股人。对此，摩拜单车表示，股权质押是VIE架构的标准流程之一，该质押情况已在美团的上市招股书中披露。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150135">ofo公司及戴威收“限制消费令”</a></p><p>36氪讯，据中国执行信息公开网披露，12月4日，法院对东峡大通（北京）管理咨询有限公司作出了“限制消费令”，该公司和戴威不得选择飞机、列车软卧、轮船二等以上舱位；不能在星级宾馆等场合消费，不能买房买车旅游等。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150142">屈臣氏回应关闭海外旗舰店：为了更好地集中资源</a></p><p>据界面，针对天猫、京东等电商平台海外旗舰店关闭一事，屈臣氏方面回复称，“关店是正常的市场行为，目的是为了更好地集中资源。今后，品牌将继续用在天猫和京东的屈臣氏官方旗舰店，持续为消费者提供高质量产品与便捷的服务。”</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150107">美国众议员呼吁Facebook解除马克·扎克伯格CEO职务</a></p><p>据Techweb，科技巨头Facebook在未经用户同意的情况下允许其他公司访问用户的个人数据。因此，当地时间周三，美国众议员博比·拉什敦促Facebook解雇其首席执行官马克·扎克伯格。此外，该报道还发现，Facebook允许Netflix和Spotify阅读用户的私人信息，亚马逊也可以通过他们的朋友获取用户的姓名和联系方式。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150094">欧尚今日多家门店出现联名维权，大润发整合欧尚启动</a></p><p>据联商网，消息称欧尚多家门店出现了员工现场联名维权的现象，员工对于整合后的薪资福利、组织架构、职位变化、工作地点及内容等提出了疑问和诉求。而据欧尚一位不愿署名的管理层透露：“12月13日，大润发托管欧尚消息一经宣布，欧尚采购中心人员开始到大润发办公，大润发总部为此预留了500个工位。2月15日开始，大润发开始对欧尚门店进行改造，3月31日前完成改造。”</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150138" target="_blank" style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">开价月薪20k-40k，今日头条招募保险方向产品负责人</a><br/></p><p>据经济观察网，某家招聘类门户网站显示，今日头条12月开始招募保险方向的产品负责人，主要负责保险业务的产品策划和设计工作，打造特色鲜明的互联网保险产品和应用；对接保险公司、选取、定制符合用户需求和保险业务规划的保险产品。具备互联网保险或互联网金融产品工作经验者优先，月薪20k-40k。此前消息，字节跳动已收购保险经纪公司和证券投资咨询公司。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150127" target="_blank">Netflix：没有碰过Facebook用户的私信</a></p><p>据界面援引《纽约时报》，通过Facebook用户本人的内容分享行为，Netflix此前或能读取甚至删除某些Facebook用户的私人消息。对此，Netflix表示，“我们从来没有读取过Facebook用户的私人消息，也没有发出过类似的请求。”</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150134" target="_blank">华硕董事长施崇棠坦诚手机失败：拼到最后已经没办法</a></p><p>据新浪科技，华硕董事长施崇棠近日坦承，曾被他寄予重望、重振华硕雄风的手机业务已经失败了。施崇棠表示，拼到最后已经没办法，却不敢讲，“乱降低成本的结果，就是消费者发现产品怎么是这样子的东西。”他还表示，未来华硕手机不再拼性价比，而将专注电竞以及专业用户。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150143">哈啰程亮：全面升级供应商合作是3-5年内的重大经营战略</a></p><p>36氪讯，“通过成本领先、技术创新、产品体验以及效益提升等四个方面全面升级供应商合作，达到真正的战略协同，是哈啰今后3-5年的重大经营战略”，哈啰出行供给经营管理中心总经理程亮认为。哈啰出行CEO杨磊表示，哈啰在行业率先推出信用免押骑，截至2018年9月，已累计辐射1.1亿用户，免除押金约219亿。截至2018年12月，已累计辐射1.61亿用户，免除押金超320亿。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150105" target="_blank">土巴兔被曝撤销IPO申请，公司称静默期不便回应</a></p><p>据《证券日报》，有消息称互联网家装网站土巴兔集团控股有限公司赴港IPO受挫，因资金问题未通过审核已撤销上市。“上述消息应该没什么大的出入，目前港交所官网还未披露信息，是因为时间的原因，估计半个月之后会在官网公开披露。”上述人士补充道。土巴兔有关负责人表示“公司正处于静默期，不方便接受采访。”</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150074" target="_blank">度小满获天津银行200亿元授信</a></p><p>据亿欧，度小满金融与天津银行签署战略合作协议，双方共同推进在金融科技、普惠金融、支付结算、零售金融等七大领域全面深化战略合作。根据协议，天津银行将为度小满金融提供200亿元的授信额度支持，其中100亿元定向用于教育分期等场景消费金融。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150087" target="_blank">百度智能小程序开源联盟成立，首批成员App月活超30亿</a></p><p>36氪讯，百度智能小程序开源联盟今日正式成立，爱奇艺、快手、WiFi万能钥匙、58同城、汽车之家、携程、万年历、猎豹移动、百度视频、宝宝巴士、卓易等12家企业与百度正式签约，成为智能小程序开源联盟首批战略合作伙伴。未来这些企业将陆续在各自旗下的App支持运行智能小程序，成为百度智能小程序的重要入口。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150037" target="_blank">谷歌CEO皮查伊再次抛售母公司股票，套现1040万美元</a></p><p>据腾讯科技援引外媒，最新监管文件显示，谷歌CEO桑达尔·皮查伊本月19日以平均每股1041.5美元的价格抛售了10000股母公司Alphabet的股票，共套现约1040万美元。</p><h3 label="二级标题">投融资</h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150141" target="_blank">马斯克今年或为SpaceX筹集共12.57亿美元资金</a></p><p>据TechWeb援引外媒，从SpaceX的融资情况来看，到今年年底，埃隆·马斯克可能最终会为SpaceX筹集12.57亿美元资金。在今年11月，SpaceX从美国银行那获得一笔2.5亿美元的贷款。此外，该公司还在今年4月获得5.07亿美元投资。知情人士透露，SpaceX此轮5亿美元融资的投资者，包括现有股东和新的投资者巴美列捷福。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150148" target="_blank">印度外卖公司Swiggy融资10亿美元：Naspers领投，腾讯参与</a></p><p>据腾讯科技，继领投教育初创公司Byju&#39;s的5.4亿美元融资后，南非投资巨头Naspers领衔投资了印度外卖公司Swiggy的10亿美元融资。外媒报道称，除了Naspers，腾讯也参与了Swiggy公司本轮融资，新的投资者还包括Hillhouse Capital和惠灵顿管理公司。这笔交易是中国境外的外卖公司获得的最大一笔投资。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150044" target="_blank">“同程生活”获数千万元天使轮融资</a></p><p>36氪讯，同程旅游孵化的“同程生活”进入社区团购领域。同程生活CEO何鹏宇宣布，“同程生活已经获得数千万元人民币的天使轮投资，股东包括腾讯、同程等。未来一年内，同程生活计划继续融资数亿元，日服务家庭超过百万个，为冲击百亿市值的独角兽企业而努力。”</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150070" target="_blank">女性共享办公Wing获红杉等7500 万美元投资</a></p><p>据外媒报道，女性共享办公空间Wing宣布进行C轮融资，准备融资7500万美元。此次融资由红杉资本领投，在线旅游房屋租赁服务Airbnb和风投公司Upfront Ventures以及现有投资者NEA和共享办公鼻祖 WeWork 参与投资。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150069" target="_blank">Versa获腾讯数千万美元A 轮融资</a></p><p>据投资界，Versa正式宣布完成由腾讯投资的数千万美元的A 轮融资，同时，Versa旗下App 产品“马卡龙玩图”获得苹果AppStore年度优秀本土App。Versa创始人蔡天懿表示，腾讯此次投资后，双方将在移动端“抠图”这个场景里做进一步的挖掘。并且，Versa的视频版人景分离功能将于2019 年Q1正式上线。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150122" target="_blank">“未名之光”完成千万元A轮融资</a></p><p>36氪讯，“未名之光”已经完成了 5000 万元人民币 A 轮融资。对于未来业务的规划，团队表示也会考虑幼儿园之外的其他业务，同时基于幼儿园业务和及团队过往的业务进行协同，例如海外国际学校、国际游学亲子游、外教引入等。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150032" target="_blank">“当红齐天”获得英特尔战略投资</a></p><p>36氪讯，科技文化公司“当红齐天”今日宣布获得来自英特尔的战略投资。当红齐天计划将这笔融资用于基于定位系统VR技术的内容研发应用，开发包括大空间多人行走在内的，以VR、AR、MR技术为核心的整体内容解决方案及市场推广。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150036" target="_blank">半固态电池企业“24M”获2180万美元D轮融资</a></p><p>据汽车之家援引外媒，由中国台湾科学家蒋业明博士于2010年创办的电池研发企业“24M”获得了2180万美元的D轮融资。该公司目前致力于研发半固态锂离子电池的研发和生产。半固态电池是指电池中任一侧电极不含液体电解质，另一侧电极含有液态电解质。或者单体中固体电解质质量或体积占单体中电解质总质量或总体积之比的一半。</p><h3 label="二级标题">新产品</h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150124" target="_blank">腾讯云发布新一代移动金融开发平台，开发效率提升200%</a></p><p>36氪讯，腾讯云发布新一代移动金融开发平台TMF，整合腾讯在移动产品开发、测试、发布、运营上的成熟技术能力，能够为多场景下的移动金融应用开发提供全生命周期的支撑和管理，帮助金融机构低成本、高效率地构建移动金融服务。基于腾讯云腾讯云新一代移动金融开发平台TMF打造移动金融服务应用，综合开发效率将提升200%。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150147" target="_blank">淘宝直播明年将推扶贫版块，培养农民主播</a></p><p>36氪讯，据淘宝直播相关负责人介绍，2019年，淘宝直播将开辟专门的扶贫版块，并推出农民主播计划，为农民主播提供系统培训。阿里巴巴数据显示，过去三年间，旗下经济体助农平台已先后培育10万名农民主播。另据淘宝直播透露，截至目前，淘宝直播上粉丝过百万的主播已超过1200人。</p><h3 label="二级标题">今日观点</h3><p><a href="https://awtmt.com/articles/3457221?from=wscn" target="_blank"><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">欢聚时代李学凌：ofo真正的死因在于“一票否决权”</span></a></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">据全天候科技，</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">欢聚时代董事长兼CEO李学凌在其朋友圈称，ofo真正的死因在于“一票否决权”。</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">他解释称，目前，戴威、阿里、滴滴、经纬都拥有一票否决权。“5个一票否决权，啥事都不通过。很多创业公司不太注意法律的设定，留下很多的法律漏洞，这样的情况下对公司来讲可能造成致命的威胁。”李学凌表示。值得注意的是，马化腾也在朋友圈对ofo溃败原因发表评论称，“是一个veto&nbsp;right（否决权）”的问题。</span></p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150095" target="_blank">爱立信中国总裁：反全球化潮流令人担心</a></p><p>据财新，瑞典通信厂商爱立信的中国总裁赵钧陶称，反全球化是特别让人担心的潮流，但全球化趋势不可阻挡。所有的参与者，无论是国家或企业都在从中获益。目前全球化当中也确实存在问题，参与方要思考如何让全球化更健康、普惠。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150097">高通创投沈劲：5G赋能的智能互联是未来在华投资的重点</a></p><p>据凤凰科技，高通全球副总裁兼高通创投董事总经理沈劲表示，目前高通创投在中国投资超过40家公司，累计投资金额超过1.5亿美金，今年还有小米、触宝这两家公司成功上市。5G+AI赋能的8大场景将是高通创投未来投资的方向，而中国区投资的重点则是包括人工智能、XR混合现实、机器人、物联网在内的5G赋能的智能互联。在人工智能领域，高通创投更关注设备端和边缘云。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150065" target="_blank">乐创文娱董事长张昭：2020年中国电影银幕数将达到8万块</a></p><p>据财联社，乐创文娱董事长张昭在“SIR电影首届文娱大会”上表示，2020年中国电影银幕数将达到8万块。此外，张昭不认为今年中国电影行业处于寒冬，其表示：“资本寒冬很对，对行业来说一直活在春天里。”</p><h3 label="二级标题">其他重要新闻</h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150145" target="_blank">苹果用Apple Watch监控42万人心脏，下个月出研究结果</a></p><p>据台湾地区媒体iThome.com.tw报道，苹果将Apple Watch送入医疗领域野心勃勃。美国医学期刊显示，去年底苹果与斯坦福医学院合作，通过Apple Watch为将近42万人进行心率测量，成为参与人数最多的类似研究。研究结果预计将于明年一月发布。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150129" target="_blank">今年前11月，天津跨境电商进口单数同比增359%</a></p><p>据新华社，今年1月-11月，天津市跨境电商共进口1768.48万单，同比增359.3%；进口销售额25.56亿元，同比增209.8%。天津市商务局副局长刘福强介绍，天津市多个跨境电商集聚区已初具规模，跨境电商保税仓面积超过30万平方米，京东全球购、天猫国际等行业巨头均已落户天津，全市已备案各类跨境电商及支付、物流等相关企业超过300家。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/150115" target="_blank">美国参议员：国会今年不会通过自动驾驶议案</a></p><p>据盖世汽车援引外媒，美国国会参议员星期三表示，在今年休会之前，国会不会对加速引入自动驾驶汽车的议案进行投票，而这对于通用和Alphabet旗下的Waymo来说无疑是一次打击。美国国会同时也不会接受通用和特斯拉提出的电动车补贴的相关议案，两大公司建议增加或延期对电动汽车7,500美元的税务抵免。</p><h3 label="二级标题">每日商业精选</h3><p>点击订阅<a href="https://36kr.com/goods/12061">每日商业精选</a>，获取今天有用有趣最有料的一图抵千言：</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/20101506/cryuvvjrosslxcg8.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="1240,7596"/></p>

description: <p>文 | 36氪每日商业精选</p><h3 label="二级标题" style=""><span style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">阿里内容电商队伍再扩大，Z世代在B站“淘”宝指日可待</span></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">12月20日，阿里巴巴和B站宣布达成合作。B站将推动up主入淘，为旗下up主拓展收入来源。除此之外，B站自有的大量优质二次元IP将通过阿里电商服务变现，B站终于为二次元找到了一条不错的商业变现渠道。</span><br/></p><p>在与淘宝达成合作之前，B站头部up主在淘宝开店已不少见，此次官方合作将让up主们的电商变现变得更容易。up主越是能在B站更顺畅地获得收益，就越不会流向其他流量平台，up主累积的众多粉丝……</p><blockquote><p><strong>主编点评：</strong>淘宝目前正在集齐国内优质的内容或社区类平台，之前已有小红书、抖音、宝宝树等，从它们那里……</p></blockquote><h3 label="二级标题" style=""><span style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">缺乏基础设施的字节跳动要做金融，入行第一招：买买买</span></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">12月19日，36氪查询中国商标网发现，今日头条母公司字节跳动近期申请了吾先分期、轻栗分期和字节付三个商标。字节跳动此举显示它将要在互联网金融领域有所动作，未来涉及金融领域可能包括贷款、保险和投资顾问业务。</span></p><p>今年6月和8月，字节跳动先后并购了一家保险经纪公司和一家投资顾问公司，7月在今日头条App上线了“放心借”业务，在互金领域已有初步布局。</p><p>互联网公司进入互金领域……</p><blockquote><p><strong>主编点评：</strong>字节跳动在互金领域的起点并不高，主要原因是它的业务能够为金融服务提供的场景不多，没有自己的支付体系，在数据分析等方面的能力还有待提高。在可预期的将来，字节跳动会……</p></blockquote><address><p>本文来自36氪付费栏目《36氪每日商业精选》——12月20日</p><p>每天不到1元，深度资讯+主编点评，省时省心高效阅读</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/coupons/single?id=198?ktm_source=kk_feed122003_36krdaily" target="_blank" textvalue="【限时彩蛋】戳此订阅，立减10元&gt;&gt;">【限时彩蛋】戳此订阅，立减10元&gt;&gt;</a></p></address><h3><a href="https://36kr.com/goods/p/5168260?ktm_source=kk_1220content3_36krdaily" target="_blank" textvalue="已购用户戳此查看完整内容&gt;&gt;">已购用户戳此查看完整内容&gt;&gt;</a></h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/goods/p/5167814?ktm_source=kk_1219content2_36krdaily"></a></p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/goods/p/5168260?ktm_source=kk_1220content3_36krdaily" target="_blank"><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/20102804/vx8d35m2vry03a2z.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="720,1753"/></a></p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/coupons/single?id=198?ktm_source=kk_feed122003_36krdaily" target="_blank"><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201811/19082523/0wp5bd6gte7rgtqy.png!heading" data-img-size-val="720,3862"/></a><br/></p><p><br/></p>

description: <p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, href="http://36kr.com/search/articles/%E5%88%9B%E6%8A%95%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F?page=1&ts=1526362042649">创投观察系列</a>的第165篇</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">分享人：星瀚资本创始合伙人杨歌</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">编辑：36氪顿雨婷</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">生命科学是一个将持续五十年到一百年的大波段，能够承载很多经济载体。鉴于整个产业周期相对较长，一方面需要创业者具备非常强的商业嗅觉，知道在每个阶段下应该怎么去资本化、怎么形成商业回报、怎么开拓市场；另一方面需要投资人完成投资逻辑转变的挑战。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此外，AI+医疗虽然面对重重挑战，但发展空间很大，尤其是在基因层面上的分析。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600;">生命科学行业的价值</span></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">首先，从一个大的方向，生命科学是一个能够持续五十年到一百年这么一个大的波段，它能够承载很多经济载体。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p>前两年基因检测+基因分析的突破，给这个行业构建了入门条件，尤其是2012年CRISPR技术的发现。它是人体基因的剪刀，就像上个世纪四十年代图灵提出图灵机的过程，它是一个新行业的入口。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p>当时图灵提出图灵机这个概念之后，引起了整个欧洲乃至全球非常大的反响。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">生命科学正处于一个与之非常类似的过程：大门已经打开，有非常多的企业入场，它能够快速地提高我们的健康程度，改变我们的生活状态，同时带来非常大的商业价值。</span></p><p>为什么这么看好生命科学？首先在美国市场上，我们看到了一些前瞻性的指标。2011年、2012年时，美国市场开始出现这个行业的风险投资，当时投资生命科学、生物医药的比例都比较低，只有不到10%。但是到了2015年、2016年，我们发现这个比例已经上升到了30%-35%左右。这个时间内，我们仍然在投资互联网和TMT。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p>这两年市场进入到经济调整期，产生了一部分的行业泡沫。与此同时，我们发现国内有一个跟美国硅谷非常相似的趋势，我们接触到的生物医药公司进入到投决会及过会被投的企业越来越多，比例从5%、10%上升到20%以上。</p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">生命科学创业要点：定期现金回流<span style="color: #3D464D; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">不过，生命科学有一个特别大的挑战，整个产业周期相对较长。从最开始的理论走向实验室、走向实验工厂，之后走向临床的一、二、三期试验，然后报备FDA、FDA认证，最后拿到药号或者批示，药品上市，然后批量生产以后再形成市场反馈，会有非常长的周期。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p>首先，对于生物医药行业的创业者来讲，在这个周期里要把握好节奏，知道在每个阶段下如何进行资本化，如何形成定期的现金回流。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></p><p>举例来说，渡过早期实验阶段进入到临床的这些公司，为了能够有商业的模型，为了能够吸引资金和大众的眼光，通常都会去做CRO，即药品的研发管理，帮助大型的药企做一些研发工作，从而产生现金流；而非一直等到它的成药形成之后，再去完成一个市场化商业的过程。</p><p>这其实是对很多企业家的一个挑战，综合来看，他必须要有较强的商业嗅觉，能够在每个阶段不断形成一定的商业回报，使资本与企业间形成一个较好的节奏，发展速度会较快。</p><h3 label="二级标题" style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">投资逻辑的挑战</span></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">与之对应的是，生命科学的投资逻辑和过往我们所熟悉的投资逻辑是完全不一样的。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">我们把医疗分成四个方向：</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><ul style="list-style-type: disc;" class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>传统医疗，包括制药、医疗器械，传统的医疗服务和传统医院；</p></li><li><p>商业化医疗，基于传统医疗延伸出的可以商业化的科室，现在形成了这些商业医院；</p></li><li><p>互联网医疗，基于互联网社区社群关系，利用大数据分析成立的医疗企业和问诊平台；</p></li><li><p>生命科学。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p></li></ul><p>在这四个方向上，唯一和互联网相似的流量模式，只有互联网医疗，它是用流量作为基础，然后数据增长、用户增多后进行转化的方式；而另外三个方向与过往几年我们熟悉的投资逻辑相比是完全不一样的。这对很多VC来讲是一个转型的挑战。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p>对于生命科学这个方向的投资，其实还很像科技类型的投资。科技类型投资最重要的一点，就是科研成果的转化，能够真正将科技价值进行商业化转型，形成产品，形成能够广泛应用的商业模式，最终产生市场价值。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">一个特点在于，产业周期相对比较长，要在产业链上所配给的资源比较多；还要从技术到产品到商业全方位分析它的价值，最终形成转化的过程。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">AI+医疗的前景</span></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">除了生命科学，这两个月我对AI+医疗也有一个非常详细的分析，我把它分成三个方向：</span></p><ul style="list-style-type: disc;" class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">AI+医疗在影像学上的使用</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此种应用基于图像识别，不是真正直接处理医疗类数据，而是处理图象数据，然后供给于图像分析，为CT、超声这些图像做一些辅助化的分析。随着图像识别的模块逐渐成熟之后，AI辅助处理图像已经可以实现一些医疗商业化的应用，发展速度是比较快的。但是它现在仍是处在辅助诊断的阶段，要想真正做到治疗，或者是深入到真正可以去治病的层面上，难度还是相对比较大的。</span></p></li><li><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">AI对所有病历的数据分析</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">这里面有统计规律的分析，有通过AI模型算法的分析，主要处理的是一些病历上的病理类数据，在这些数据中寻求规律。这个过程难度相对也比较大。大家希望AI实现代替医生问诊，至少是轻问诊，这里面涉及到大量的语言处理、专业化信息的处理，这个过程我相信在未来几年会有一个提升。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">但也有很多的难点和挑战，主要来自于两个方面：首先，医疗信息数据的标准化目前还有待提高，需要把大量的信息进行标准化分析；其次，基于这些信息，需要能够进行明确的语义，特别是医疗语义的分析，语义模块在这两年发展速度虽然很快，但是还没有达到一个标准化的过程。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p></li><li><p><strong>AI在基因层面上的分析</strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">即在基因层面上、生物层面上、生命科学层面上使用大量的人工智能技术，这可能才是大部分人真正想象的科技未来。</span></p></li></ul><p>从2000年我们知道基因测序到今天，这些所有DNA到底表象是什么过程？它的展现过程是什么？致病的过程是什么？癌症和基因突变是怎么形成的？这些事情在不断的研究，但是还没有一个非常清晰的解析过程。</p><p>而人工智能在里面会发挥非常多的作用。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">比如说这部分基因怎么变成RNA？怎么变成蛋白？怎么变成组织？怎么会发生错误？这个过程都是需要人工智能去分析。以及如果发生错误，我们需要一个方法治疗它的时候，要反向去编程，然后用人工智能再去分析哪些编程是有用的。这个过程非常像计算机科学，所以现在越来越多计算机科学的人才进入到AI+医疗的领域中，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">特别是进入到2017、2018年，这种类型的公司越来越多，包括癌症治疗、基因治疗，推动了整个行业的发展。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">对于人工智能结合生命科学的项目来讲，如果不懂技术应该如何判断，最主要的是两个因素：</span></p><p>其一，创业者在这个行业里面具备绝对领袖的基础，在国内国外、大型药企、大型的基因公司内都有一定影响力和基础关系，这是第一个条件；</p><p>其二，他必须具备非常强的商业嗅觉，知道在每个阶段下应该怎么去资本化、怎么形成商业回报、怎么开拓市场。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p>
title: 创投观察 | 生命科学创业者应具备阶段性商业化的能力

description: <p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">昨日，一则寻找人工耳蜗的消息在微信朋友圈刷屏，起因是一个价值 20 万的人工耳蜗不小心被遗失，遗失者不仅生活受到影响，还可能要重新做手术，“开颅重新植入设备”。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">事实上，这次讨论的背后存在一些误区。人工耳蜗，分为外部处理器（形似蓝牙耳机）和植入体两部分。植入体需要手术植入，这次丢失的是体外机。若真的无法寻回，再匹配一个同样厂家同等型号的体外机即可，并不需要开颅动手术。目前，失主姐姐已就此事致歉。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">而在此次事件之外，人工耳蜗行业值得关注的部分在于：</span></p><address><p>17 万以上的昂贵治疗方案，会一直持续吗？</p><p>“贵”的核心难题如何被技术解决？</p><p>在进口产品几乎垄断行业的情况下，是否有国内创业公司尝试在此领域创新？</p></address><h3 label="二级标题" style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, sans-serif;">人工耳蜗如何让患者重返“有声世界”？</span></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/20020956/sri2ebzi0mnj0jbg.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="720,578"/></p><p label="二级标题" style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">当然，前文也提到，人工耳蜗只适用于重度听损患者，适合进行植入手术的只占 10%。可是，中国大约有 1.5 亿人存在听力障碍，60 岁以上老年人患听力残疾的比例也高达11%。那剩下的人怎么办？对此，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">目前主流的办法是佩戴助听器，它主要适用于 90 分贝以下听损。</span></p><p>助听器是一个放大器，即对声音进行放大处理，通过鼓膜、听骨链、耳蜗、听神经到达大脑，可视作耳朵的“外挂”。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">与人工耳蜗类似，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">国内的助听器市场也是长期由欧美公司把持，其中 6 大品牌（峰力、西门子、瑞声达、斯达克、奥迪康、唯听）垄断了全球 95% 市场。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">但与人工耳蜗不同的是，助听器行业在近年来出现了明显变化：</span></p><ul style="list-style-type: disc;" class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">首先，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">无线充电、蓝牙耳机、远程麦克风等技术在助听产品中得以应用，原本高度依赖人力且十分不便的助听器验配工作渐渐被替代</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">；</span></strong></p></li><li><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">其次，电子音像产品的普及和噪声侵害也让中度以下听力受损人群数不断上升，需求规模上涨</span></strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">“不景气”的助听生意开始被重视</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">。</span></p></li></ul><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">近年来，国内涌现出了一批智能助听器研发公司，包括<a href="http://www.eartech.cn/">智听科技</a>&nbsp;、<a href="http://www.tinglibao.com.cn/">豆听科技</a>、<a href="https://www.36kr.com/p/5144848" target="_blank">又听科技</a>、<a href="http://zuaa.zju.edu.cn/news/view?id=6950" target="_blank">阳光助听</a>等；也有提供一站式助听解决方案的落地案例，譬如<a href="http://36kr.com/p/5065568.html">爱耳时代</a>等。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">另外，智能耳机品牌开始打“助听”的主意，像Doppler增加了更多“听力增强”功能；德国Bragi</span><a href="http://www.myzaker.com/article/591bd0871bc8e0c653000011/" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft sans-serif;">推出新款 Dash Pro 智能无线耳机；苹果也投入巨资开发了W1通信芯片等技术，往助听产品发力；Bose推出助听耳机</span><a href="http://www.dospy.com/news/news/2016-12-12/60802.html" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;,
